SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE TRUNC(CREATE_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT dates.orderDay, NVL(COUNT(M.CREATE_DATE), 0) AS countMember FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS orderDay FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) dates LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON TO_CHAR(M.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = dates.orderDay GROUP BY dates.orderDay ORDER BY dates.orderDay

SELECT dates.orderDay, NVL(COUNT(P.CREATE_DATE), 0) AS countBoard FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS orderDay FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) dates LEFT JOIN POST P ON TO_CHAR(P.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = dates.orderDay GROUP BY dates.orderDay ORDER BY dates.orderDay

SELECT dates.orderDay, NVL(COUNT(C.CREATE_DATE), 0) AS countComment FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS orderDay FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) dates LEFT JOIN "COMMENT" C ON TO_CHAR(C.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = dates.orderDay GROUP BY dates.orderDay ORDER BY dates.orderDay

SELECT dates.orderDay, NVL(COUNT(NC.CREATE_DATE), 0) AS countComment FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE) - LEVEL + 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS orderDay FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7 ) dates LEFT JOIN NESTED_COMMENT NC ON TO_CHAR(NC.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = dates.orderDay GROUP BY dates.orderDay ORDER BY dates.orderDay

SELECT USER_NO, USER_EMAIL, USER_NAME, USER_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER
WHERE USER_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE USER_EMAIL LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
WHERE USER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY
USER_NO
USER_EMAIL
USER_NAME
USER_NICKNAME
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT * FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN ROLE R ON M.ROLE_NO = R.ROLE_NO LEFT JOIN USER_GRADE UG ON UG.GRADE_NO = M.GRADE_NO LEFT JOIN POINT P ON M.USER_NO = P.USER_NO WHERE M.USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "COMMENT" C JOIN NESTED_COMMENT NC ON C.USER_NO = NC.USER_NO WHERE C.USER_NO = #{userNo}

SELECT TITLE, BC.BIG_CATEGORY_NAME, SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, B.BOARD_NO FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN POST P ON B.POST_NO = P.POST_NO LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY SC ON B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = SC.SUB_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN BIG_CATEGORY BC ON SC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO = BC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO WHERE B.USER_NO = #{userNo}
AND B.BOARD_NO LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND P.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
AND P.CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'
ORDER BY
B.BOARD_NO
BC.BIG_CATEGORY_NAME
BC.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME
P.TITLE
SELECT TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN POST P ON B.POST_NO = P.POST_NO WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT TITLE, BC.BIG_CATEGORY_NAME, S.SUB_CATEGORY_NAME, C.COMMENT_NO, NESTED_COMMENT_NO FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN POST P ON B.POST_NO = P.POST_NO LEFT JOIN SUB_CATEGORY S ON B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = S.SUB_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN BIG_CATEGORY BC ON S.BIG_CATEGORY_NO = BC.BIG_CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN "COMMENT" C ON C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO JOIN NESTED_COMMENT NC ON NC.COMMENT_NO = C.COMMENT_NO WHERE C.USER_NO = #{userNo} OR NC.USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT TITLE, CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN POST P ON B.POST_NO = P.POST_NO WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, P.CONTENT, C.CREATE_DATE, C.MODIFY_DATE, C.CONTENT AS commentContent FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN POST P ON B.POST_NO = P.POST_NO LEFT JOIN COMMENT C ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo}

SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, P.CONTENT, NC.CREATE_DATE, NC.MODIFY_DATE, NC.CONTENT AS commentContent FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN POST P ON B.POST_NO = P.POST_NO LEFT JOIN "COMMENT" C ON B.BOARD_NO = C.BOARD_NO LEFT JOIN NESTED_COMMENT NC ON C.COMMENT_NO = NC.COMMENT_NO WHERE NESTED_COMMENT_NO = #{nestedCommentNo}
SELECT * FROM BIG_CATEGORY
SELECT * FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN POST P ON P.POST_NO = B.POST_NO WHERE B.SUB_CATEGORY_NO = #{subCategoryNo}

SELECT M.USER_NICKNAME, P.TITLE, P.CONTENT, P.CREATE_DATE, P.MODIFY_DATE, B.POST_NO FROM POST P LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON P.POST_NO = B.POST_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON M.USER_NO = B.USER_NO WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
